item.description:
If it is like last year, the public can walk to warning track after the race, around 10:30. The Natives were the last on the field, much to the groundskeeper's dismay who ended up begging Mindy to get the hell off the field :)

I'm thinking of gathering at Game On! afterward. I'll create a separate meetup for that.

I am participating this year on the Huskies for Heroes team. If you want to donate please visit:
http://www.runtohomebase.org/2013runtohomebase/jackiebarlow
item.name: Walk the Warning Track after Run to Home Base
